title: Skillet Lasagna
directions: Combine sauce and water in skillet and bring to a boil.
Wrap kitchen towels around lasagna and break into quarters.
Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 16 to 18 minutes or until noodles are tender, stirring occasionally.
Add pressed garlic and cook 1 minute.
Remove from heat, drain, and add meat to lasagna.
Chop parsley and set some aside for garnish.
Combine cheeses, parsley, and black pepper.
Cover and simmer gently for 3 to 5 minutes or until cheese is melted and ricotta is heated through.
To serve, sprinkle with parsley and parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef, turkey, or sausages
